review: I bought this as a gift for my wife so we could stream movies.  It was easy to install, set up and use.  I was disappointed in that Amazon advertises that you can watch thousands of movies free as a prime member.  I suggest you check closely when you watch a movie.  If it suggests a rented price, it's not free.  Only movies with the "watch now" indicator are free.  Otherwise I like the unit and would recommend it to others

author: Uncle John

review: I got this device when i signed up for SlingTV.  As a recent cord cutter, i'm finding the FireTV becoming my "go-to-device" for viewing.  We currently have several different devices (Chromecast, Rasberry Pi running Kodi, OTA Antenna, Chromebook) and with our Prime account we have access to so much high quality content.  I really thought we would just be using the Fire to watch SlingTV & Netflix, but the Prime Library has grown so much, that it's #WINNING.We choose the Fire TV box over the Fire stick because it has additional memory and a beefier processor which we felt were important and well worth the difference in price.  I've heard great things about the stick and haven't used one so i can give a side by side comparison, but the Fire TV has over-performed for us.
